body_html: This is useful to know. However, something like this would require all jobs on the cluster to respect that environment variable when using GPUs. And it takes away some of the scheduling responsibility that should ideally belong to the CUDA driver, adding another layer of complexity. In fact, most other toolkits that are GPU capable will not require something like this and as long as the GPUs are set in exclusive mode, they work just fine.
